scripts.prebuild-spec: git remote rm travis-origin 2>/dev/null ; git remote add travis-origin "git@github.com:${TRAVIS_REPO_SLUG:-tc39/ecma262}.git" && git fetch --quiet travis-origin
scripts.build-spec: YEAR=2021 && git checkout --quiet "es${YEAR}" && mkdir -p "out/${YEAR}" && cpr img "out/${YEAR}/img" && ecmarkup --verbose spec.html "out/${YEAR}/index.html" --css "out/${YEAR}/ecmarkup.css" --js "out/${YEAR}/ecmarkup.js" && git checkout --quiet travis-origin/test-travis
scripts.prebuild-only: npm run clean && mkdir out && cpr img out/img/
scripts.build-travis: npm run build-head && npm run build-spec
